arabic.title: الدنيا ريشه في هوا
text: ياما ناس بتتقابل من غير ميعاد يجمع بينهم
و ناس بتتحايل على الفراق يبعد عنهم

english.title: Life is a Feather in the Air
text: Life is a feather in the air
but tomorrow where will we be?
So many people meet without a previously set meeting,
and other people beg of separation to stay away from them
Who put them together with his hands?
What was the reason for their meeting? what? what?
And why did they get separated? why? why?
Life is a feather in the air
but tomorrow where will we be?
Oh, you who are asking about life
Just take it as it is
there are smiles and pain in it
There's cruelty and tenderness in it
and others who make it content
Life is a feather in the air
but tomorrow where will we be?

arabic.title: قلب القاسى
text: قلب القاسى يحب و يصبح ناسـى
أوعى يا قلبى تحب و يطلع قاسـى
قلب القاسى يحب و يصبح ناسـى
أوعى يا قلبى تحب و يطلع قاسـى
قلب القاسى يحب و يصبح ناسـى
أوعى يا قلبى تحب و يطلع قاسى

english.title: The Cruel Heart
text: The cruel heart loves, and becomes forgetful
Why would it occupy itself? why?
Be careful, my heart, to fall in love and she1 turns out cruel
Would it content you to be torn (no no)
What does she have to with me and I with her?
What does she have to with me and I with her?
Or is she returning my gazes and my doubt?
Or is her situation like mine
My perplexity is destined for her
Or is her situation like mine
My perplexity is destined for her
Oh my days, you are unjust
if you are satisfied with my humiliation
The cruel heart loves, and becomes forgetful
Why would it occupy itself? why?
Be careful, my heart, to fall in love and she1 turns out cruel
Would it content you to be torn (no no)
If her eyelashes throw me [into love]
If her eyelashes throw me [into love]
I'll play along and love her
I'll play along and love her
Oh my days, you are unjust
if you are satisfied with my humiliation
The cruel heart loves, and becomes forgetful
Why would it occupy itself? why?
Be careful, my heart, to fall in love and she1 turns out cruel
Would it content you to be torn (no no)
